hero.title: Mounifull
hero.subtitle: Taste tradition. Share Lebanon. Support women
hero.description: Experience the authentic taste of Lebanese mouneh - traditional that brings families together across generations.

products.title: Shop
products.subtitle: Discover our range of authentic Lebanese mouneh
products.tip: Tip: Click a product to view details.

step1.title: Add to Cart
step1.description: Browse our products and click "Add to Cart" on items you want to purchase. You can adjust quantities as needed.
step1.tip: The cart icon shows your total items

step2.title: View Cart
step2.description: Click the cart icon in the top navigation to review your selected items, quantities, and total price.
step2.tip: You can modify or remove items here

step3.title: Check Out
step3.description: Click "Checkout" to proceed with your order. You'll be taken to a secure checkout page.
step3.tip: Review your order details before proceeding

step4.title: WhatsApp Message
step4.description: After checkout, you'll be redirected to WhatsApp to send your order details directly to us for confirmation and delivery arrangements.
step4.tip: We'll confirm your order and arrange delivery

needHelp.title: Need More Help?
needHelp.description: If you have any questions about our products or ordering process, feel free to contact us:

story.title: About Us
story.subtitle: Welcome to MOUNIFULL, a home for authentic Lebanese mouneh

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is simple: to connect the heart of Lebanese villages to every home across Lebanon. We help women market the delicious foods they prepare in their kitchens, made with love, care, and the finest natural ingredients.

traditional.title: Traditional & Sustainable
traditional.description: Rooted in tradition, inspired by health and sustainability

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: By choosing our mouneh, you're not only enjoying authentic Lebanese flavors, but also supporting women's economic empowerment and helping preserve a beautiful culinary heritage.

empowerment.title: Women's Empowerment
empowerment.description: Supporting women's economic independence through traditional skills

preservation.title: Cultural Preservation
preservation.description: Keeping Lebanese culinary traditions alive for future generations

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.description: At MOUNIFULL, we believe food is more than just nourishment – it is a story of family, culture, and community. That's why, alongside our products, we share:

nutritional.title: Nutritional Advice
nutritional.description: Help you eat well with expert guidance

guides.title: Traditional Guides
guides.description: Mouneh-making guides to keep traditions alive

stories.title: Success Stories
stories.description: Stories from women producers across Lebanon

cta.title: Join Our Journey
cta.description: Together, we make healthy, authentic food accessible, trustworthy, and filled with meaning.
cta.tagline: Taste tradition. Support women. Share Lebanon.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Fill the form and we'll get back soon.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Content to be provided by client following the brand story.

payment.title: Payment Policy
payment.subtitle: Content to be provided by client.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Content to be provided by client.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.welcomeSubtext: By accessing or purchasing from our website, you agree to the following Terms & Conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services.
terms.aboutUsText1: MOUNIFULL is a Lebanese brand dedicated to preserving the tradition of Lebanese mouneh, made by local women using organic ingredients and traditional methods.
terms.aboutUsText2: Our goal is to make healthy, authentic Lebanese food easily accessible across Lebanon and beyond.
terms.definitionsText2: "You" refers to any user, visitor, or customer of our website.
terms.productsText1: All MOUNIFULL products are handmade, preservative-free, and locally produced.
terms.productsText2: Because of the artisanal nature of our products, slight variations in taste, color, or texture may occur. These variations are part of the product's authenticity and not considered defects.
terms.ordersPaymentsText1: Orders are confirmed once payment is completed.
terms.ordersPaymentsText2: Prices are displayed in USD or LBP, depending on your selected payment method.
terms.ordersPaymentsText3: We accept Cash on Delivery and Online Payment (where available).
terms.ordersPaymentsText4: MOUNIFULL reserves the right to update product prices or discontinue products at any time.
terms.shippingDeliveryText1: We deliver across Lebanon within 2 to 5 working days.
terms.shippingDeliveryText2: Delivery fees vary depending on location and will appear at checkout.
terms.shippingDeliveryText3: You must inspect your package upon delivery. If a product is damaged or incorrect, please notify us within 24 hours by email or WhatsApp with a photo.
terms.returnsRefundsText1: Due to the nature of food products, we cannot accept returns or exchanges once the packaging is opened.
terms.returnsRefundsText2: If a product arrives damaged or defective, please contact us within 24 hours of delivery, and we will offer a replacement or refund.
terms.returnsRefundsText3: Refunds are issued only in the case of verified product issues.
terms.intellectualPropertyText1: All content on this website — including the logo, packaging, images, product descriptions, and design — are the property of MOUNIFULL.
terms.intellectualPropertyText2: You may not copy, reproduce, or distribute any part of this website without written permission.
terms.privacyPolicyText1: Your personal information (such as name, address, phone, and email) is used only to process orders and improve our service.
terms.privacyPolicyText2: We never sell or share your data with third parties.
terms.privacyPolicyText3: You can request deletion or correction of your personal data at any time by contacting us.
terms.liabilityDisclaimerText1: MOUNIFULL is not responsible for delays or damages caused by delivery services or force majeure (e.g., road closures, weather conditions, strikes, or political events).
terms.updatesToTermsText1: We may update these Terms & Conditions from time to time. The most recent version will always be available on our website.
terms.updatesToTermsText2: Your continued use of our website constitutes acceptance of the latest version.
terms.contactUsText1: For any inquiries or feedback, please contact us:
